text:
[Verse]
Staring at the sky so wide
In the night where dreams collide
Stars above they shine so bright
Lost in this celestial light

[Verse]
Whispers of the night so clear
In the silence feel no fear
Constellations paint the way
Guiding hearts that went astray

[Chorus]
Lost in the stars tonight
Floating in the endless flight
Holding on to dreams so tight
Lost in the stars' pure light

[Verse]
Wishing on a fleeting spark
Burning through the endless dark
Every star a tale to share
In this moment without care

[Verse]
Comets trace a path of gold
Stories of the brave and bold
Universe it softly sings
To the tune of angel wings

[Chorus]
Lost in the stars tonight
Floating in the endless flight
Holding on to dreams so tight
Lost in the stars' pure light
title: Lost in the Stars
